value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Terran Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: A new and hopefully improved version of my guides for each race where I go over as many basics as possible while doing it live :)  I strongly believe that a super structured guide style is not very helpful compared to watching/playing the game actively.  Feedback is greatly appreciated. -- Watch live

value.title: Mastering Starcraft 2: Defensive Protoss vs Terran
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 tutorial we look at a high-grandmaster match between myself and Lord Timorus. I'm using a very defensive protoss style with colossus and blink vs a mine drop into 3 rax. Let's master Starcraft 2 together!  #Starcraft #protoss #colossus #sc2 #guide #RTS #realtimestrategy #StarCraft2

value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Baneling Bust INTELLIGENTLY! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Baneling Busting is one of the easiest Zerg all-ins in the game. Most Zerg players are aware of this strategy and realise that it works great on the lower part of the ladder in Zerg versus Terran, Zerg versus Protoss and Zerg versus Zerg.   In this video I discuss how to Baneling Bust intelligent instead

value.title: StarCraft 2: VOID RAY & LURKER NERFS - The OFFICIAL Balance Patch!
value.excerpt: New balance changes were just announced for StarCraft 2. These are my very first impressions of the patch. This patch includes changes to the Shield Battery, Dark Templar, Void Ray, Queen, Widow Mine, Lurker and Nydus Worm. value.title: StarCraft 2 - Beginner Protoss Opening | The PiG Daily #155
value.excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR Challenge: "Feinting Attacks" - A feint is where you give the impression of attacking in one place where its fake or just a small distraction from the real thrust of your attack. Examples: Using empty drops or hallucinations to pull your opponent out of position!  Send submissions to
